ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:21:22 [Issue ID 4000-700191] urn:comicvine:4000-700191 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-08 20:29:16. [Issue ID 700191]
ComicInfo.Summary:
What do you do when an intergalactic league of blade wielders try to get rid of you? Start your own team! Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including two covers from Dan Mendoza (Zombie Tramp, DollFace)!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Boo Rudetoons | 3 | | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Boo Rudetoons | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 6 |
*Notes* Overall issue #35. The digital edition (2/6/2019) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Crisis On Alternate Earth Part Two
